result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brent A Buffington

records.addlTxt:
District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Julian Murrufo
Defendant Brent A Buffington in court. 

Defendant would like time to get an attorney.
Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.
Order on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: 09:50 AM Defendant Brent A Buffington in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Julian Marrufo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation.  Defendant requests the court appoint counsel.  Court swears defendant.  Court denies request.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence.
